title: Chief Stawinski Provides Update on Incident on Lorring Drive
body:
On
Thursday, Chief Stawinski provided an  update in the investigation into an
incident that resulted in the wounding of two Prince George's County Police
officers. Please click on the link below to hear the latest in the
investigation.  In a
separate update, one of the two wounded PGPD officers was treated and released
from the hospital. The second officer remains hospitalized and is undergoing
treatment for an injury to the arm and face. Both of the officers are assigned
to the Special Operations Division. The
entire incident remains under investigation. (Facebook Live Link)https://www.facebook.com/PGPD1/videos/2244006772500074/
Posted by


Prince George's County Police


at
